name: SHOOTY (Josh Kitchen)
description:
SHOOTY An endless, retro space shooter

Shoot your way through an endless asteroid field!

Gain points for every asteroid you destroy, lose points for each one that hits you.

See if you can beat your friends highscore!

Controls:
  • Left and right arrows to move
  • Z/C to fire on keyboard, O button on controller
  • X to quit/start a game 
Credits:
  • Made by Josh Kitchen (twitter: @josh_kit_games)
  • The music is 'Space' by @gruber_music (part of his Pico-8 Tunes Volume 1)
